relationships.description: Lee Jordan and Hermione agree on meeting once a week for Defense lessons.
Angelina starts to suggest something but is interrupted by Hermione.
Katie Bell suggests the library as a meeting place.
Harry expresses his concerns about Madam Pince's reaction to jinxes being done in the library.
